scripts.start: pnpm build:happ && concurrently -k "UI_PORT=1420 pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm launch" "hc playground" "pnpm push-notifications-service" -p command -l 20
scripts.build:happ-release: nix build .#dash_chat_happ.dna_hashes -o workdir/dash-chat && nix build -L .#dash_chat_happ -o workdir/dash-chat.happ
scripts.package: nix build -L .#dash_chat_happ -o workdir/dash-chat.happ && pnpm -F ui package && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.network:android: pnpm build:happ && concurrently -k "UI_PORT=1420 pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm tauri dev --release" "pnpm tauri dev --release" "pnpm tauri android dev --release"
